components/accordion.title: Accordion Component
components/accordion.description: A collapsible content component for organizing information in expandable sections.

components/alert.title: Alert Component
components/alert.description: A component for displaying important messages and notifications.

components/avatar.title: Avatar Component
components/avatar.description: A component for displaying user profile pictures or initials.

components/badge.title: Badge Component
components/badge.description: A small component for displaying status, counts, or labels.

components/barchart.title: Bar Chart Component
components/barchart.description: A component for displaying data in bar chart format.

components/breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb Component
components/breadcrumb.description: A navigation component showing the current page location.

components/button.title: Button Component
components/button.description: The Button component is a fundamental interactive element that allows users to perform actions. It comes in various styles, sizes, and states to fit different use cases.

components/calendar.title: Calendar Component
components/calendar.description: A date picker component for selecting dates.

components/card.title: Card Component
components/card.description: The Card component provides a flexible container for grouping related content and actions.

components/carousel.title: Carousel Component
components/carousel.description: A component for displaying content in a sliding carousel.

components/chat.title: Chat Component
components/chat.description: A component for displaying chat messages and conversations.

components/checkbox.title: Checkbox Component
components/checkbox.description: A checkbox input component for selecting multiple options.

components/commandpalette.title: Command Palette Component
components/commandpalette.description: A searchable command palette for quick actions.

components/dateinput.title: Date Input Component
components/dateinput.description: A specialized input component for date selection.

components/dropdown.title: Dropdown Component
components/dropdown.description: A dropdown menu component for displaying options.

components/input.title: Input Component
components/input.description: The Input component provides a styled text input field with various configurations and states.

components/linechart.title: Line Chart Component
components/linechart.description: A component for displaying data in line chart format.

components/lists.title: Lists Component
components/lists.description: A component for displaying ordered and unordered lists.

components/modal.title: Modal Component
components/modal.description: The Modal component provides a flexible dialog overlay for displaying content, forms, or confirmations.

components/navigation.title: Navigation Component
components/navigation.description: The Navigation component provides a flexible navigation bar with support for various layouts and menu items.

components/otpinput.title: OTP Input Component
components/otpinput.description: A component for entering one-time passwords or verification codes.

components/pagination.title: Pagination Component
components/pagination.description: A component for navigating through paginated content.

components/paymentplan.title: Payment Plan Component
components/paymentplan.description: A component for displaying pricing and payment plans.

components/progressbar.title: Progress Bar Component
components/progressbar.description: A component for displaying progress or loading states.

components/radio.title: Radio Component
components/radio.description: A radio button component for single selection.

components/range.title: Range Component
components/range.description: A slider component for selecting values within a range.

components/searchinput.title: Search Input Component
components/searchinput.description: A specialized input component with search functionality.

components/separator.title: Separator Component
components/separator.description: A visual separator component for dividing content.

components/switch.title: Switch Component
components/switch.description: A toggle switch component for boolean values.

components/table.title: Table Component
components/table.description: A data table component for displaying structured data.

components/tabs.title: Tabs Component
components/tabs.description: A tabbed interface component for organizing content.

components/text.title: Text Component
components/text.description: A styled text component with various typography options.

components/themeswitch.title: Theme Switch Component
components/themeswitch.description: A component for switching between light and dark themes.

components/title.title: Title Component
components/title.description: A styled heading component with semantic HTML.

components/toast.title: Toast Component
components/toast.description: A notification component for displaying temporary messages.

components/togglegroup.title: Toggle Group Component
components/togglegroup.description: A group of toggle buttons for multiple selection.

components/tooltip.title: Tooltip Component
components/tooltip.description: A component for displaying contextual information on hover.

design-system/overview.title: Design System Overview
design-system/overview.description: loom-css is built on a comprehensive design system that provides consistency, scalability, and maintainability across all components and applications. This guide will help you understand the core principles and structure of our design system.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: This guide will help you install and set up loom-css in your project. Choose the installation method that best fits your needs.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to loom-css, a modern, flexible CSS design system built for React and Vue applications. loom-css provides a comprehensive set of components, utilities, and design tokens that help you build beautiful, consistent user interfaces quickly and efficiently.

react/getting-started.title: React Getting Started
react/getting-started.description: Get up and running with loom-css in your React application. This guide will walk you through the basics of using loom-css components in React.

vue/getting-started.title: Vue Getting Started
vue/getting-started.description: Get up and running with loom-css in your Vue application. This guide will walk you through the basics of using loom-css components in Vue 3.
